resources.string: 1.Timer is seen on the upper left corner of the screen and the time limit is 30 seconds.
2.ScoreBox is seen on the upper right corner of the screen and will be updated on every correct/incorrect answer.
3.Question is in the middle of Timer and Scorebox.
4.There are four options,choose the correct one.
5.Score as high as you can,keep training your mind using BrainTrainer Pro App!
